deepCINET

Base class for all estimators in scikit-learn.

ECINET

Base class for all estimators in scikit-learn.

Attributes

__version__

cinet.__version__
class cinet.deepCINET(nnHiddenLayers=(128, 512, 128, 0), **kwargs)[source]

Bases: BaseCINET

Base class for all estimators in scikit-learn.

Notes

All estimators should specify all the parameters that can be set at the class level in their __init__ as explicit keyword arguments (no *args or **kwargs).

_validate_params()[source]

Validate all parameters initialized in the model. This function is a private function called every time that .fit() is called.

getConfig()[source]

return a configuration object for the neural network

The config object must contain the following parameters:

nnHiddenLayerstuple

A tuple of integers to configure the layers in the neural net

batchnormbool

A boolean to determine if batch normalization should be applied

get_model(config)[source]

return the siamese model (PyTorch model)

Parameters

config (dict) – A dictionary containing configuration variables relevant to the model.

Return type

A PyTorch model for the network.

class cinet.ECINET(*, modelPath='', batch_size=256, num_workers=8, folds=5, use_folds=False, momentum=5.0, weight_decay=5.0, sc_milestones=[1, 2, 5, 15, 30], sc_gamma=0.35, delta=0.0, dropout=0.4, learning_rate=0.01, device='cpu', seed=420)[source]

Bases: BaseCINET

Base class for all estimators in scikit-learn.

Notes

All estimators should specify all the parameters that can be set at the class level in their __init__ as explicit keyword arguments (no *args or **kwargs).

getConfig()[source]

return a configuration object for the neural network

The config object must contain the following parameters:

nnHiddenLayerstuple

A tuple of integers to configure the layers in the neural net

batchnormbool

A boolean to determine if batch normalization should be applied

return the siamese model (PyTorch model)

Parameters

Return type
